title: Bug 118780 - Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old columns name when select the dataset
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder and double-clicking the first column name, the original name of the column is displayed below the expression builder instead of the expected alias name.
EB: According to SCR 78193 in the tracker, the first column in the expression builder should use the alias name instead of the original name. When double-clicking the first column name, the alias name should appear instead of the original name.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the expression builder.
2. Select a dataset.
3. Double-click the first column name.
4. Observe that the original column name is displayed below the expression builder instead of the expected alias name.
